description: Enable seamless interaction with Hacker News directly from Claude Desktop. Browse latest, top, and best stories, view detailed story information, and read comments with clean formatting for enhanced readability. Access Hacker News content effortlessly using natural language or commands.

tools.name: hn_latest
tools.description: Get the latest/newest stories from Hacker News

limit.description: Number of stories to fetch (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: hn_top
tools.description: Get the top-ranked stories from Hacker News

limit.description: Number of stories to fetch (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: hn_best
tools.description: Get the best stories from Hacker News

limit.description: Number of stories to fetch (1-50, default: 10)

tools.name: hn_story
tools.description: Get details for a specific story by ID

story_id.description: The ID of the story to fetch

tools.name: hn_comments
tools.description: Get comments for a story (by story ID or index from last story list)

story_id.description: The ID of the story to get comments for

story_index.description: The index (1-based) of the story from the last fetched list
